2018.question: We saw them quarrel. (Choose the most suitable passive voice)
2018.prashna: हमने उन्हें झगड़ते देखा। (सबसे उपयुक्त कर्मवाच्य चुनें)

options.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
options.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
options.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

vikalpa.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
vikalpa.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
vikalpa.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

2019.question: They .................... here next week. (Choose the correct verb form )
The line 'Hoping to cease not till death' is taken from .................... (Choose the correct option)

2020.question: He has broken his leg, so he………. play football. (Choose the correct auxiliary verb)
2020.prashna: उसका पैर टूट गया है, इसलिए वह फुटबॉल नहीं ......। (सही सहायक क्रिया चुनें)

2020.question: ‘Are you coming with us?' He asked me. (Choose the correct indirect speech)
2020.prashna: 'क्या तुम हमारे साथ आ रहे हो?' उसने मुझसे पूछा। (सही इनडायरेक्ट स्पीच चुनें)

options.A: He asked me if I was coming with them
options.B: He asks if I was coming with them
options.C: He had asked if I was coming with them
options.D: He will ask if I am coming with them

vikalpa.A: He asked me if I was coming with them
vikalpa.B: He asks if I was coming with them
vikalpa.C: He had asked if I was coming with them
vikalpa.D: He will ask if I am coming with them

2021.question: You ............... give up smoking. (Choose the correct option)
2021.prashna: आपको धूम्रपान ............... छोड़ देना चाहिए। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2021.question: Choose the correctly spelt word :
2021.prashna: सही वर्तनी वाले शब्द को चुनें :

2021.question: ............... is bad for health. (Choose the correct option)
'Now the Leaves are Falling Fast' talks about the ............... of human life.
2021.prashna: 'नाउ द लीव्स आर फॉलिंग फास्ट' मानव जीवन की ............... के बारे में बात करती है।

2022.question: He said, "It may rain tomorrow." (Choose the correct indirect speech)
2022.prashna: उसने कहा, "कल बारिश हो सकती है।" (सही इनडायरेक्ट स्पीच चुनें)

options.A: The next day it will rain said he
options.B: The rain will be there tomorrow was said by him
options.C: He said that it might rain the next day
options.D: Raining tomorrow is what is said by him

vikalpa.A: The next day it will rain said he
vikalpa.B: The rain will be there tomorrow was said by him
vikalpa.C: He said that it might rain the next day
vikalpa.D: Raining tomorrow is what is said by him

options.A: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't had any
options.B: I asked for chocolates, but she didn't had none
options.C: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't none
options.D: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't have any

2023.question: They will wash the car............? (Choose the correct option)
I don't know how the money I kept in my wallet got............. (Choose the correct option)
2023.prashna: मुझे नहीं पता कि मेरे बटुए में रखे पैसे कैसे ............. हो गए (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2023.question: Who is considered the greatest English dramatist?
2023.prashna: किसे सबसे महान अंग्रेजी नाटककार माना जाता है?

vikalpa.B: लोगों का सेवक (servant of the people)

2024.question: Nadal won all the matches played in Paris. (Choose the correct negative sentence)
2024.prashna: नडाल ने पेरिस में खेले गए सभी मैच जीते। (सही नकारात्मक वाक्य चुनें)

options.A: Nadal does not win all the matches played in Paris.
options.B: Nadal did not lose a single match played in Paris.
options.C: Nadal was not able to lose any match played in Paris.
options.D: Nadal had lost any match not played in Paris.

vikalpa.A: नडाल पेरिस में खेले गए सभी मैच नहीं जीतता है।
vikalpa.B: नडाल ने पेरिस में खेला गया एक भी मैच नहीं हारा।
vikalpa.C: नडाल पेरिस में कोई भी मैच हारने में सक्षम नहीं था।
vikalpa.D: नडाल ने पेरिस में नहीं खेले गए किसी भी मैच को खो दिया था।

2024.question: Neither of the two men ........... done this. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: दोनों में से किसी भी आदमी ने यह ........... किया है। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2024.question: Find out the ........... things. (Choose the correct option)
I didn't ........... where he was going. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: मुझे ........... नहीं था कि वह कहाँ जा रहा था। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2025.question: The children locked ......... up in the cupboard.
2025.prashna: बच्चों ने खुद को अलमारी में बंद कर लिया।

2025.question: We arrived on ......... fourth of July.
2025.prashna: हम जुलाई की चौथी तारीख को पहुंचे।

2025.question: I ......... swim across the river.
2025.prashna: मैं नदी तैरकर पार कर सकता हूँ।

2025.question: ......... they played well, they could not win.
2025.prashna: ......... उन्होंने अच्छा खेला, वे जीत नहीं सके।

2025.question: I am not ill, but I am ......... tired.
He said, "I am going to college just now." (Choose the correct indirect narration)
2025.prashna: उसने कहा, "मैं अभी कॉलेज जा रहा हूँ।" (सही अप्रत्यक्ष कथन चुनें)

options.A: He said that he was going to college just now.
options.B: He asked that he was going to college just then.
options.C: He said that he was going to college just then.
options.D: He asked that he was going to college just now.

vikalpa.A: उसने कहा कि वह अभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.B: उसने पूछा कि वह तभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.C: उसने कहा कि वह तभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.D: उसने पूछा कि वह अभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।

2025.prashna: पुरानी अंग्रेजी अवधि का समय है
